show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #32 John Coleman Locke "Just find a method to communicate!"
subtitle: #32 John Coleman Locke "Just find a method to communicate!"
summary:
Our good friend John C Locke of the Locke Division of JD Hudgins joins us to visit about the history of their ranch and share lessons learned and passed down through the years about succession and people management.
